Reviews.Title: “great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: k H
Reviews.Content: wife stayed nights hotel torino week happy hotel ten minutes walk termini station walkable city wasnt huge staff consistently helpful friendly able 1pm checked breakfast choice excellent restaurants hotel carpets brand perfectly clean noise street traffic hotel street rome oh souvenir shop door souvenirs cheap happy recommend

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely a fine hotel”
Reviews.Author: paulinhobeccon
Reviews.Content: bit anxious stay torino hotel reading bad reviewsbut 5 days stay torino assure hotel absolutely fine location nice descent breakfast nice outdoor seating staff mega friendly location plus hotel close termini form safe rest rome hotel 5 star super hotel bad totally fine

Reviews.Title: “Good location and services”
Reviews.Author: CorinaAB
Reviews.Content: closed termini station visiting attractions value money nice cold buffet breakfast espresso coffee friendly staff except smiling lady apparently chief learn hardworking staff morning 10 minutes breakfast dont remember pay ruined morning scenes weak founded stay hotel recommend

Reviews.Title: “Great location, just average”
Reviews.Author: MSev13
Reviews.Content: hotel torino looks nice entrance lobby nice window looking dirty backyard refurbishment beds comfortable airconditioning piled dirt fan 4 star standard hardly 3 star breakfast variety sweets coffee breakfast staff nice overall average considering price paid worth season standard rome

Reviews.Title: “Just run away.”
Reviews.Author: Swalosky
Reviews.Content: dirty light bad service 4 stars hate write bad reviews hotel pay money bad service reasons prefer stay neither wife liked

Reviews.Title: “Avg Stay”
Reviews.Author: Prijain13
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 days enjoyed stay hotel minute train station hotel located center popular sightseeing easily accessible stay hotel wasnt clean staff wasnt helping

Reviews.Title: “Keep your expectations low and you may be just fine.”
Reviews.Author: alan f
Reviews.Content: wife lousy experience mid september englishspeaking front desk staff couldnt cared peeling wallpaper empty bottle left toilet didnt bathroom hotel unattractive levels mention bed springs told front desk staff toilet didnt gentleman im sorry feeling hes heard complaint brushed serve guest desperately trying check breakfast ok coffee machine decent cappuccino close train station im pretty overnight stopover guest reason stay obvious hotel ratings meaningless class range low otherwise week vacation

Reviews.Title: “4* hotel ?? Definately NOT.”
Reviews.Author: roscotrain
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel nights mid september 2011 booked months aware reviews whoever grades hotels rome wrong means star floor overlooking main street bathroom tiny bathroom moderately clean shower tiles spray disinfectant furniture wardrobe outdated ceiling door walked refurb reception smart sense olde worlde breakfast average usual continental style write home fill gap staff reception course customer relations smile engage customer conversation trip wouldnt gone miss roof top terrace plenty seating provided escape hour sit relax watching hustle bustle streets below bonus hotel location situated minute walk central train station bus tram terminus extremely useful bought roma card public transport lot roads lead rome buses trams led 2 minutes hotel hotel situated pleasant ample close lovely buildings architecture explore moments paid 313 euros night stay extra 18 euros top tourist tax classed 4 star hotel tax meant paid 3 euros night 3 start hotel 2 euros night hotel experience didnt ruin holiday stay advertised 4 hotel expect wouldnt stay 3 hotel prices reflect pay little genuine 4

Reviews.Title: “4 Star Hotel ....Not!!”
Reviews.Author: Calfan63
Reviews.Content: stayed 7 days family trip italy stayed quad 1 2 single beds 1 master double bed 2 singles thin uncomfortable starters hot water shower hard 2 days power easy front desk helpful offer help maid service left alot bed moved real cleaning furnishings cared toilet fixed durring stay upside hotel pretty location couple blocks termini train station walking distance sites coliseum trevi piazza resturants reccomend

Reviews.Title: “NOT RECCOMMENDED”
Reviews.Author: AlanLiverpool
Reviews.Content: stated 2 nights jan colleagues attend conference found staff surly learn smilethe morning hot water hotel despite guests complaining none afternoon warm hotel fashioned dark beds uncomfortablethe saving grace hotel clean cold buffet breakfast plentiful classed budget ourselves werent paying bill wouldnt return business leisure wont reccommending else

Reviews.Title: “not really ****”
Reviews.Author: LMitterer
Reviews.Content: hotel ok definitely real venue simple mentioned clean simple beds comfortable clean service ok hotel hotel expect price low

Reviews.Title: “Convenient location but not too helpful”
Reviews.Author: spry13
Reviews.Content: blocks main train station limited service hotel elevator numerous steps street lobby half flight elevator level staff assist luggage desk staff helpful internet service internet cafes east street breakfast top floor indoor outdoor seating

Reviews.Title: “Convenient location”
Reviews.Author: mosaiciste
Reviews.Content: little shabby clean bathroom stocked toiletries located 2 blocks central train station time stayed noticed covers desk day impatient people coming popular hotel time smiled minute time answer question smiled helpful wake call didnt restaurant informal couple doors street

Reviews.Title: “Affodable Rome”
Reviews.Author: jimbocnewyork_NY
Reviews.Content: pay torino value frills price clean comfortable ample breakfast dont breakfast terrace sharing dining location convenient train station major attractions staff lacking charm efficient fair hard upscale elsewhere youre budget

Reviews.Title: “Dont book this place if you truly expect 4 stars!”
Reviews.Author: MTVB80
Reviews.Content: booked hotel honeymoon night glad night person desk bored disinterested didnt help luggage push concierge services marking map beds extremely springy uncomfortable carpet didnt look clean wasnt water pressure continous shower air conditioning expected toiletries 4 star hotel tissues maybe ive spoiled 4 star hotels breakfast average view terrace nice coffee terrible waiter mobile phone time concierge forgot call taxi airport reviews nailed experience hotel id try else hotels choose similar cost definetly 4 star

Reviews.Title: “A true surprise”
Reviews.Author: elmadanat1961
Reviews.Content: coming rome cruise east mediterranean starting venice booked night torino hotel flying home day usualy book wife kids time booked little pet worried surprise looks junior sweet separated plasma tv safe bathroom jacuzzi breakfast rich hotel located nice 200 meters termini

Reviews.Title: “Greeting”
Reviews.Author: anuska_1987
Reviews.Content: express satisfaction stay hotel welcome receptionist salvatore nice service staff service breakfast pay attention hotel rating 10 10

Reviews.Title: “ask to see the room before booking it....”
Reviews.Author: B_Andrei
Reviews.Content: tried hotel rome 5 day trip online seriously 100 euros reviews bad rome booking hotel door door train prices vicinity train station travelers decided quiet kinda ok bath shower clean wireless hotel money 5 euros 2 hours tv free local tv cnn channels breakfast ok terrace building

Reviews.Title: “Dust and thin mattress - hard to sleep”
Reviews.Author: Footballerswife
Reviews.Content: hi aware hotel stand dust asthma etc carpets extremely dirty probably vacuumed ages beds hard due thin mattress proper breakfast roof terrace fairly service checkin desk highspeed wlan extra charge

Reviews.Title: “not a 4 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: Saikhnaa
Reviews.Content: location fine locates near metro station easily hotel worth 4 star hotel staff front desk wasnt friendly waiting finish phone talk computer sometime reserved double bed twin bed instead double bed bugging front desk times changed nice stands corner torino people enter restaurant tell am sorry couldnt promise restaurant wifi free

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel close to railway station”
Reviews.Author: DTWinfield
Reviews.Content: hotel times suites period architecture surrounding hotel clean standard walk catch metro easily romes attractions staff nice helpful breakfast overlooking rome nice relaxing

Reviews.Title: “Very close to railway and bus station. Not a 4* hotel very poor facilities.”
Reviews.Author: lindajane24
Reviews.Content: hotel close main bus rail stations terravision bus airport 4 euros downside satellite tv service restaurant bar remained closed times breakfast poor typical continental croissants etc 4 hotel positive note walking distance main sight seeing attractions
